00087 
00088 template <class T>
00089 void observable :: add(T val)
00090 {
00091         for (uint j=0;j<vector_length_;++j) 
00092                 samples[j+current_bin*vector_length_]+=static_cast<double>(val);
00093         ++current_bin_filling;
00094         if (current_bin_filling == bin_length_) //need to start a new bin next time
00095         {
00096                 if (bin_length_>1) for (uint j=0;j<vector_length_;++j)
00097                         samples[current_bin*vector_length_+j]/=bin_length_;
00098                 if( current_bin == (length - 1)) //need to allocate more memory for a new chunk of bins
00099                 {
00100                         valarray<double> old=samples;
00101                         samples.resize(2*old.size(),0.);
00102                         samples[slice(0,old.size(),1)]=old;
00103                         length += length;
00104                 }
00105                 ++current_bin;
00106                 current_bin_filling=0;
00107         }
00108 }
00109 
00110 template <class T>
00111 void observable :: add(T* val)
00112 {
00113         for (uint j=0;j<vector_length_;++j) 
00114                 samples[j+current_bin*vector_length_]+=static_cast<double>(val[j]);
00115         ++current_bin_filling;
00116         if (current_bin_filling == bin_length_) //need to start a new bin next time
00117         {
00118                 if (bin_length_>1) for (uint j=0;j<vector_length_;++j)
00119                         samples[current_bin*vector_length_+j]/=bin_length_;
00120                 if( current_bin == (length - 1)) //need to allocate more memory for a new chunk of bins
00121                 {
00122                         valarray<double> old=samples;
00123                         samples.resize(2*old.size(),0.);
00124                         samples[slice(0,old.size(),1)]=old;
00125                         length += length;
00126                 }
00127                 ++current_bin;
00128                 current_bin_filling=0;
00129         }

00132 template <class T> 
00133 void observable :: add(vector<T>& val)
00134 {
00135         if (!current_bin && val.size()>vector_length_) {
00136                         vector_length_=val.size();
00137                         samples.resize(length*vector_length_,0.);
00138         }
00139         for (uint j=0;j<vector_length_;++j) 
00140                 samples[j+current_bin*vector_length_]+=static_cast<double>(val[j]);
00141         ++current_bin_filling;
00142         if (current_bin_filling == bin_length_) //need to start a new bin next time
00143         {
00144                 if (bin_length_>1) for (uint j=0;j<vector_length_;++j)
00145                         samples[current_bin*vector_length_+j]/=bin_length_;
00146                 if( current_bin == (length - 1)) //need to allocate more memory for a new chunk of bins
00147                 {
00148                         valarray<double> old=samples;
00149                         samples.resize(2*old.size(),0.);
00150                         samples[slice(0,old.size(),1)]=old;
00151                         length += length;
00152                 }
00153                 ++current_bin;
00154                 current_bin_filling=0;
00155         }
00156 }
